Procs

proc getIpInfo(ip: string): JsonNode {...}{.raises: [Defect, IOError, OverflowError,
    ValueError, JsonParsingError, Exception, HttpRequestError, SslError,
    TimeoutError, ProtocolError, KeyError], tags: [ReadIOEffect, WriteIOEffect,
    TimeEffect].}

getIpInfo

use ip-api.com free service limited to abt 250 requests/min

exceeding this you will need to unlock your wan ip manually at their site

the JsonNode is returned for further processing if needed

and can be queried like so

var jj = getIpInfo("208.80.152.201")
for x in mpairs(jj):
   echo x
echo()
echo jj["city"].getstr
proc getWanIp(): string {...}{.raises: [], tags: [ReadIOEffect, WriteIOEffect, TimeEffect].}

getWanIP

a way to get your wanip 

proc showIpInfo(ip: string) {...}{.raises: [IOError, ValueError, Exception], tags: [
    ReadIOEffect, WriteIOEffect, TimeEffect, RootEffect].}

showIpInfo

Displays details for a given IP

Example:

showIpInfo("208.80.152.201")
showIpInfo(getHosts("bbc.com")[0])

pingy

small utility to ping some server

pingy("yahoo.com",4,dodgerblue)   # 4 pings and display progress in some color
pingy("google.com",8,aqua)
pingy("ping.sunet.se",4,lime)
proc cxPortCheck(cmd: string = "lsof -i") {...}{.raises: [IOError, ValueError, Exception,
    OSError, Defect], tags: [WriteIOEffect, RootEffect, ExecIOEffect, ReadIOEffect].}
proc cxDig(ipadd: string): tuple

cxDig

returns reverse DNS of an ip address

needs dig command available on system

may or may not return expected data

see showDig() for display 

proc cxDns(dns: string): tuple

cxHost

see showHost() 

proc showDig(hostip: string = $"172.217.5.14") {...}{.
    raises: [IOError, OSError, Exception, Defect, ValueError],
    tags: [WriteIOEffect, ExecIOEffect, ReadIOEffect, RootEffect].}

showDig

reverse dns lookup , default a google ip

proc showDns(hostdns: string = "google.com") {...}{.
    raises: [IOError, OSError, Exception, Defect, ValueError],
    tags: [WriteIOEffect, ExecIOEffect, ReadIOEffect, RootEffect].}

showDns

ip and connected hosts look up for a domain name

default = google.com

showDns("bbc.com")
proc getHosts(dm: string): seq[string] {...}{.raises: [], tags: [ReadIOEffect].}

getHosts

returns IP addresses inside a seq[string] for a domain name and

may resolve multiple IP pointing to same domain

import nimcx
var z = getHosts("bbc.co.uk")
for x in z:
  echo x
doFinish()
proc showHosts(dm: string) {...}{.raises: [IOError, ValueError, Exception],
                          tags: [WriteIOEffect, RootEffect, ReadIOEffect].}

showHosts

displays IP addresses for a domain name and

may resolve multiple IP pointing to same domain

import nimcx
showHosts("bbc.co.uk")
doFinish()
proc ssService(): seq[string] {...}{.raises: [OSError, Exception, IOError, Defect],
                             tags: [ExecIOEffect, ReadIOEffect, RootEffect].}

ssService

WIP to provide color formated output to ss commands like : ss --query=tcp -r
